definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
fork in road/bifurcation/branch in road, river, mountain range etc/to branch off/to turn off/to diverge/to stray (from the path)/to change the subject/to interrupt/to stagger (times)

sentences.english: Its bifurcation characteristics are studied using the numerical integral method.
sentences.chinese: 運用數值積分法研究了系統的分岔特性。

sentences.english: The periodic solution can be bifurcated from equilibrium point with the variation of parameters.
sentences.chinese: 系統隨着參數的變化，從平衡點分岔出週期解。

sentences.english: Solving the equation numerically can obtain the bifurcating value curves.
sentences.chinese: 通過對方程的數值求解，得到了相應的分岔值曲線。

sentences.english: Be able to get back at the right hand fork again?
sentences.chinese: 能找回那個分岔口再次牽手嗎？

sentences.english: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.
sentences.chinese: 順著這條大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。

sentences.english: Intersection means the place where drifts intersect at or branch off.
sentences.chinese: 交岔點是指巷道相交或分岔的地點。

sentences.english: It is after high school their lives diverged.
sentences.chinese: 高中以後，他們的生活分岔了。

sentences.english: Bifurcations of periodic solutions in non-smooth continuous systems are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不光滑連續系統週期解的分岔問題。

sentences.english: At last we saw the end of one branch of the Shan Yuan Reservior.
sentences.chinese: 終於見到剡源水庫的一個分岔的尾部了。

sentences.english: The bifurcating routes for spiking of the neurons are displayed.
sentences.chinese: 神經元活動的分岔路徑得以表明。

sentences.english: The voice of the LORD divideth the flames of fire.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的聲音使火焰分岔。

sentences.english: The closer we got to the turnoff for my grandparents' house, the slower the car went.
sentences.chinese: 越接近去爺爺奶奶家的分岔路口，車子就越慢。

sentences.english: The transition variety and bifurcation diagram of the unfolding parametric plane are given.
sentences.chinese: 得到了系統主共振穩態響應的轉遷集和分岔圖。

sentences.english: Several bifurcation models and the associated transition boundaries of the system were given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了各種分岔模式及其相應的轉遷集。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
winding road (twisting and turning like a sheep's intestine)
road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
